text:
Annette O'Toole (born April 1, 1952) is an American actress, dancer, and singer-songwriter.
She played Lisa Bridges in the TV series "Nash Bridges"; Beverly Marsh in the "It" miniseries; Lana Lang in "Superman III"; Kathy in the romantic-comedy "Cross My Heart"; and Martha Kent, the mother of Clark Kent, on the television series "Smallville".
